Très bon jeu, surtout entre ami! Il y a régulièrement de nouveaux tueurs, de nouvelles map et de nouveux survivants. 
L'ambiance est top, nous sommes tout de suite dans l'ambiance horreur. Le jeu est prenant, on peut enchainer les games sans voir le temps passer.  
Il manque cependant le moyen de communiquer entre les joueurs, ce qui parfois est très génant, un chat ou un vocal serait pas de refus.
Il y a souvent des problèmes avec les tueurs qui sont bien trop souvent des campeurs, ce qui baisse un peu l'envie de jouer. 

En bref, il reste un jeu très divertissant, flippant, et il sait fournir des nouveautés régulièrement. C'est un excellent jeu lorsqu'on est a plusieurs.

还是给杀机一个好评，虽然现在玩的人少了，挂多了，但是玩了快700个小时，还是最喜欢这个游戏。
下次更新好像又要削弱人类啊，我想说屠夫现在一直在被加强人类还被削弱，让我们人类玩家怎么玩？
现在很多人肆意开挂，走路就跟飞一样，瞬间就不见了，这两天玩游戏举报了两个挂逼。
这么好的一款游戏，不希望被这些败类给破坏。希望杀机越做越好！希望对这些开挂的人实施重一点的惩罚！

This game's great, the idea of an asymmetrical horror where 4 survivors are forced to work together in order to escape against a deadly survivor is great, the execution of this idea in Dead by Daylight, not great (at the moment).

Currently this game is in a weird state, where in low ranks and for new players the game is really fun, the initial couple of hours playing the game always will be, being immersed in the game and hiding gives you a rush, but once that wears off the game becomes more tedious.

If you want to have the best builds for either survivor or killer, in most cases you'll need to buy at least one of the DLC characters. Also, if you're a completionist and want to max out all killers and survivors in this game, prepare to invest over 1000 hours, depending on when you buy the game, as once every few months a new killer/survivor is released.

But the main issue currently is balance. Unless you're playing nurse, pallets are currently the bane of killers. By pallet looping, even sitting at pallets and wasting them will give other survivors enough time to complete all 5 generators and escape. Furthermore the map design at the moment is terrible, with some maps heavily favoring survivors and others favoring killers. The game is currently the survivors game to lose, unless you are exceptionally good at playing killer, which takes a long time to achieve, unless you are a natural. The devs do seem interested in fixing the major balance issues, however, but this obviously takes time.

So to conclude, is the game fun? Yeah. Is the game entertaining? Yeah. Is the game fun to play for the first 20 or so hours? Yeah. Is the game fun to play in the beginning? Yeah. Is the game fun to play after that? Not at the moment, and thats why I can't recommend the game.

Also, I almost exclusively play killer, so some of my opinions on the game are skewed by that.

EDIT: 11th July 2018

Since I originally wrote this review, the developers seem to have given the game new life, with solid, consistent updates that improve the game as a whole. New killers have also been added since this review was written, specifically the Pig (I think) and the Clown. Both DLC's are strong as a whole, and in the Pigs case introduces a new solid mechanic which changes the game drastically.

Overall the game has made a great turnaround over the past couple of months, and appears to be continuing along this path. With more balance updates around the corner, I am excited for the future Dead by Daylight holds.

Dead by Daylight gehört seit einigen Jahren zu den Kulthorrorspielen auf dem Markt.
Vielleicht liegt dies daran, dass die Entwickler keine Kosten und Mühen scheuen, um immer wieder neue Updates, Killer, Überlebende und Maps auf den Markt zu bringen.
Sehr positiv ist, dass es mittlerweile viele Lizenzkiller gibt, die uns schon in den Kinos das gruseln gelehrt haben. Neben Michael Meyers wurde das Killer-Team auch um Leatherface und Freddy Krüger erweitert. 

Neben den Killern gibt es häufig auch die passenden Überlebenden und die Maps.

Ich denke, dass DbD noch lange eine große Community haben wird und die Updates das Spiel immer wieder interessant machen.

Игра замечательная! Вы возможно подумаете, что геймплей довольно однообразный, потому что сурвам нужно  просто чинить геники, а маньякам просто убивать сурвов, но это чушь. Каждая новая катка происходит на новой карте с новым маньяком. На каждой карте геймплей разительно отличается и при игре за сурва, и при игре за маньяка. Нужно ли объяснять, что разные силы маньяков требуют совершенно разных тактик. Поэтому, если вы не хотите покупать игру из-за ее однообразности, вы совершаете большую ошибку.
Классная игра рекомендую

Alors, le jeu est sympathique, l'idée de base est géniale mais :
- C'est le tueur qui host la partie, donc si il a une mauvaise connexion vous allez vous téléporter, si vous avez une connexion faible vous ne pourrez pas jouer le tueur.
- Communauté cancer, T-bag, troll, abus de certaines mécaniques du jeu.
- Gros mais alors ENORME effet snowball, pour faire simple toutes personnes qui aura 100 heures de jeux ou plus aura tellement d'avance dans les compétences / objets déblocables que vous allez vous faire violer. Alors oui des fois on s'en sort mais c'est 1 sur 100 et encore.
- Aucun matchmaking, en gros j'ai 27 heures de jeu, je commence un peu avec le monstre, qui est niveau 1 sans compétence, mon "rank" est 20 je fais face à un groupe de survivants entièrement équipé de compétences rares, objets rares et offrandes rares, de rank 19 / 17 / 15 et 6, vous voyez le souci ? Un no-match total .... et c'est bien souvent comme ça le jeu ne cherche pas vraiment à faire des parties équilibrées.

Donc si vous avez des amis avec qui jouer ça peut être marrant, et encore là ce n'est pas assuré, entre la communauté de crétin et le matchmaking aux fraises vous risquez très vite de quitter le jeu.
Limite si vous êtes 5 vous pouvez faire des parties privées entre vous.
Et seul .... bah si vous êtes sado ça peut le faire aussi.

Bon jeu, mais je ne le recommande pas, je ne suis pas pour la popularisation de ces jeux qui ne sont pas finis, non équilibrés, qui rameutent que des mauvaises communautés et ne font que des DLC sans corriger de vieux soucis.

Ótimo jogo, várias maneiras diferentes de se jogar, jogar de killer tem jogabilidade totalmente diferente de sobreviventes. Cada Killer é único o que torna a estratégia pra vence-los ou pra jogar com eles totalmente diferentes. Há grande variação de habilidades e pra colocar uma seleção num personagem que você queira te dará um sentimento de satisfação e realização. Rende muitas horas de jogo. E é bastante legal de ver seu personagem crescendo aos poucos.

This game is awesome for people who are horror addicts and love games! It is very challenging though but you can get how the game works generally. The game is still pretty buggy, but (at least for me) i dont run into bugs that often. You can be both the killer or the survivor. I recomend the killer mode for newcomers, and if you have friends to play with and help you out, then the survivor mode is just as, if not more, fun. I would only recommend this game to people who dont get heart attcks easy, and people who dont get angry easily. This game can get pretty annoying sometimes with the kind of people you run into.

Good 4v1 gameplay with a lot of fun and varied killers, with only a few balancing issues and two sort of repeats as of 1/19/18.
Also isn't really made to be played with friends and I've had some problems with it. 
Also it's ranked only aside from hunting your friends. 
Also sometimes people BM even at starting rank games, even if you're just learning to play the character you picked. There isn't really a practice mode aside from friends. 

I can somewhat forgive the DLC'd killers since the game isn't full price, but I understand complaints about it. It takes nothing from the game to not have them.

This game is beyond broke in favor for the survivor. 

Perma lock with flash lights, survivors body blocking the killer (trapper and billy shouldnt get blocked, they are massive),

buggy interupts which allow the survivors to unhook in a group and just cheese the game as a whole. 

Matchmaking is shitty as hell, level 1 players get matched together with people who've played 300+ hours with purp perks. 

Any perk worth having is made into a hex which can get destroyed in the game and totally ham string a killer before the game even gets started. Survivors get Borrowed time, and camp the hooks which make it impossible to win as a killer with premade survivor teams

Maps have gotten "better" with infinite loops with blood lust giving speed to the killer, but the devs shot that to hell by increasing the number of palletes in the map.

Hit boxes are shit, billy gets stuck on a pixel and interupted in a sprint, pallete stuns at arms length away. 

Server (host issues, P2P standards) lag with massive rubber banding, causing issues chasing or hitting.

I played when it first came out and deleted the game after 30 hours of play. Reinstalled with the "balances" and played a bit more and will uninstall again and never play. Wish big game devs give out long term demos to really get an idea of the shit game you buy. NOT WORTH THE MONEY.

咱来评价一下这游戏，游戏是好游戏从一开始的惊心动魄变到后来竞技为主。有人因为恐怖就不敢玩了，其实没什么恐怖玩久了就慢慢熟悉了屠夫的外貌就会发现好像...也挺可爱的♂。难度是有的但是不是特别难玩，我才240个小时就打到了4段，多样化的技能，各位大佬发明出了各种玩法。各大恐怖电影的杀人狂里面几乎都有，人皮脸  弗莱迪  迈克尔  马上要出的大爷。希望游戏能变的更好吧。

Ich liebe das Spiel einfach. Als Survivor es ist herausfordernd als auch auf team-work ausgelegt. Als Killer ist es ebenfalls Herausfordernd aber sobald mann sich einspielt ist es schon einfacher.

Es kommen immer mehr Inhalte was gut ist als auch patches und das regelmäßig.
Die jeweiligen Chapter sind Preiswert.

-Be me
-In a match as a chinese lady with engineering perks
-help around first generator
-chased by freddy krueger
-managed to outrun him with Lithe and he lost interest in me
-I work on final 2 generators alone
-everyone else was dreaming and hurt(soo they can't do gens)
-I run towards hooked survivor
-unhook and run away with her
-they heal up while I unlock door
-Dreamed by Krueger then chased
-hide and lose him
-run towards the other door on other side cause it was open
-last 2 team mates were fully awake and fully healed
-I was dreaming and had 1 last hit on me
-run towards the door for dear life
-Gets downed by Krueger
-even with Full health and not dreaming,last 2 people left me
-gets hooked
-died.

首先游戏公司是一个真正良心的公司，会听取玩家意见，之前中国玩家瞎起哄说屠夫出杨永信结果真给出了（放这变态来虐我们好意思吗）。其次很多人说游戏上手难度大，玩逃生者把把第一个上钩，玩屠夫被溜得飞起，前期没有技能与祭品的确会比较困难，（白手起家一点难度都没有的游戏乐趣就会少很多），熬过这个时期之后你才能真正体会到这个游戏的乐趣（全地图哪个钩子没挂过！）。

Teams im ua. TS sind sowieso Krebs und generell wird man ja als Killer eh IMMER als Camper beschimpft sofern man nicht direkt und sofort ans andere Ende der Map rennt.

Im großen und ganzen überwiegt der Ärger über schlechte Community, zu unbalancierte Talente und Maps.

Ich mag dieses Spiel sehr aber....

... der Spielspaß wird einen genommen durch die Devs. 
Killer werden durch Parks immer mehr  gepusht so das es für die Überlebenden immer schwerer wird.
Bis dahin ja noch ok und zuverkraften aber das von den Devs auch noch Tunneln ( immer auf den gleichen Spieler gehen) und Campen (vor dem Haken stehen bleiben)  als spielweiße geduldet wird, so das die Überlebende garkeine Überlebenschance haben, nimmt nicht nur einen den Spielspaß sondern frustet einen ungemein.

Der arme Killer ist den Überlebenden ja unterlegen. Bullshit. Campen und Tunneln sollte verboten werden. 
Das ist keine Spielweiße. Ein guter Killer hat das nicht nötig.
Bitte liebe Devs, ändert was daran.

After getting teabagged by entire team of voice-chatted survivors way above my level of play, I decided to uninstall this terrible game again.
It has a decent gameplay, but absolutely broken matchmaking, and extremely toxic community.
It is a known fact that playing killer is much more stressful than playing survivor, which I find ridiculous for a horror game.

Old review:
I thought this game is about hiding from killer and being afraid of him.
Turned out it's about running in circles, dropping wooden pallets and teabagging poor lonely guy who just wants to get close to you.The whole idea of hide-and-seek is wasted, since the best tactic is to have one guy wasting killer's time whole match while others do objectives.

I was excited about personalized perks for each surviror just to see everyone play different styles with a black girl covered in blood so they are harder to notice. The whole teachable perks system makes characters completely non-unique.

And the surviror mains' community... The most toxic snake pit I've ever seen in a multiplayer game.

I still play this crap though, very addictive...

Anyway, if you're looking for a horror game, stay away from this one.

Nigdy nie grałem w tak wkurwiającą grę jak "Dead by daylight", w tej grze masz doczynienia z zabójcą który ma zadanie cię kampić oraz później tunnelować przez co 1 gra trwa max 5 minut. Główne zadanie ocalałych to jest zrobienie 5 generatorów i ucieczka z mapy, przez co killerem bez ruiny nie ma sensu grać bo zrobią je szybciej niż powiesisz 1 ocalałego na haku. Społeczność tej gry jest chyba jeszcze bardziej toksyczna niż ruskie dzieci w cs'ie.
Plusy tej gry:
-Ilość postaci jak i map.
-Grafika
Minusy tej gry:
-Społeczność 
-Hitboxy
-Od chuja błędów
-Cena za grę jak i wszystkie DLC
-Kampiące i tunnelujące ścierwa
